response.message:
Good to see an update!
I think the data explorer is an excellent tool (at least to programmers).
I wanted to add graphs myself, but couldn't really get it to run at the time. I might give it another try in the future, I have some more ideas...

Thanks!
A huge thanks to Tim for his help on this excellent project!
Very very cool enhancements. Although I'm not sure why you got rid of being able to delete a query. But then again I might be an edge case.
I used Data explorer couple of time but only with already stored query, I would suggest to have a separate section for most frequent queries, as  most of user only use that.
